channel.description:
> # [color=steblue]Noble[/color] > **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Social[/color]** > > Passive: Royal Blood > > Day Ability: Private Matters: All whispers to and from you will be hidden for the rest of the day. 2 uses. > > Day Ability: Reveal Transcripts: Learn the last four whispers to and from your target (even between days). 4 uses. > > Night Ability: Maid Spy: Send a maid to hear the target's conversation, allowing you to hear their whispers. It will stay on the target until you use this again. Unlimited uses. > > Night Ability: Snoop
> # [color=purple]Aristocrat[/color] > **[color=purple]Unseen Social[/color]** > > Passive: Royal Blood > > Day Ability: Private Matters: All whispers to and from you will be hidden for the rest of the day. 2 uses. > > Day Ability: Reveal Transcripts: Learn the last four whispers to and from your target (even between days). 4 uses. > > Night Ability: Maid Spy: Send a maid to hear the target's conversation, allowing you to hear their whispers. It will stay on the target until you use this again. Unlimited uses. > > Night Ability: Forge: Get a copy of your target's logs. If they die, hide them from the public. 2 uses.
> **[color=blue]Psychic (Unique Blue Dragon Social)[/color]** :shield: > > Passive: Astral Network: You may speak to anyone you have linked with anonymously at night. They can also talk to each other. Anyone in jail cannot hear or speak using the chat. This passive will remain if your class changes. > > Day Ability: Focus Link: Reset the cool down for Alter Link. 2 uses. > > Day Ability: Telepathy: Send an anonymous message to everyone. 2 uses. > > Night Ability: Alter Link: Target player is immediately added to the astral network. If they are already in the astral network they are immediately removed. The network cannot have more than 4 other players at once. Unlimited uses. 1 day cool down.
> **[color=purple]Illusionist (Unique Unseen Social)[/color]** :shield: > > Passive: Astral Network: You may speak to anyone you have linked with anonymously at night. They can also talk to each other. Anyone in jail cannot hear or speak using the chat. This passive will remain if your class changes. > > Passive: Skilled: You can use both night abilities in the same night. > > Day Ability: Focus Link: Reset the cool down for Alter Link. 2 uses. > > Day Ability: Telepathy: Send an anonymous message to everyone. 2 uses. > > Night Ability: Alter Link: Target player is immediately added to the astral network. If they are already in the astral network they are immediately removed. The network cannot have more than 4 other players at once. Unlimited uses.. 1 day cool down. > > Night Ability: Mind warp - Target player receives incorrect feedback tonight . Unlimited uses.
Tell me if you have any ideas to replace Snoop. Preferably whisper based.

item.title: Social Rework (v2)
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
NightX:

Day Ability: Reveal Transcripts: Learn the last four whispers to and from your target (even between days). 4 uses.

This could also be a snoop replacement instead: Transcript(2 uses) - reveal all whispers to and from your target. Can work on the dead.

NightX:

Night Ability: Forge: Get a copy of your target’s logs. If they die, hide them from the public. 2 uses.

This should just allow you to edit your target’s logs instead.

NightX:

Day Ability: Focus Link: Reset the cool down for Alter Link. 2 uses.

Change this so it removes a target instead, and give it unlimited uses.

NightX:

Day Ability: Telepathy: Send an anonymous message to everyone. 2 uses.

This should make your chat anonymous for the rest of the day(it would be toggleable), and give it unlimited uses. This would make it so psychic’s can’t waste uses of it.

NightX:

Night Ability: Alter Link: Target player is immediately added to the astral network. If they are already in the astral network they are immediately removed. The network cannot have more than 4 other players at once. Unlimited uses. 1 day cool down.

Rename this to conduit. Change this so it just adds your target to the network(this is because players wouldn’t be likely to claim if there are other players listening). Remove the network limit(or at least say why it should have one). Also remove the cooldown. This makes it very slow for the psychic to gather claims(N1: add a player. N2: nothing. N3: remove a player. N4: nothing. N5: add a player). I know that it’s for apostle, but they will already be suspicious when they haven’t added a player. And they could just change their claim if they haven’t been jailed. Even if they have, this will force the prince to reveal themselves.

NightX:

Night Ability: Alter Link: Target player is immediately added to the astral network. If they are already in the astral network they are immediately removed. The network cannot have more than 4 other players at once. Unlimited uses… 1 day cool down.

Illusionist shouldn’t have this. People won’t be likely to claim if they could be converted. Replace this with hypnotize(select a false night feedback result for your target to receive)

Shrimpy:

It’s proposed that Bewilder be an ability of the Unseen too. And it doesn’t even need to be in every game, just have a reasonable chance of being used (like Scorned frame).

Maybe it could work as a nightshade wine replacement for butler. Nightshade wine doesn’t fit with the rest of butler’s abilities anyways, and bewilder does.
